00065 
00067 class DeletedNodeList {
00068 
00069     public:
00070 
00071         DeletedNodeList() : m_start(0), m_end(0)
00072         {}
00073 
00074         ~DeletedNodeList()
00075         {
00076             DeletedNode* temp = m_start;
00077             while(temp)  {
00078                 temp = m_start->GetNext();
00079                 delete m_start;
00080             }
00081         }
00082 
00083         DeletedNode* PopBack()
00084         {
00085             DeletedNode* ret_val = m_end;
00086             if(m_end)  {
00087                 if(m_start == m_end)  {
00088                     m_start = m_end = 0;
00089                     return ret_val;
00090                 }
00091                 m_end = m_end->GetPrevious();
00092                 m_end->SetNext(0);
00093                 
00094                 ret_val->SetPrevious(0);
00095             }
00096             return ret_val;
00097         }
00098 
00099         void PushBack(DeletedNode* node)
00100         {
00101             if(!node)
00102                 return;
00103             if(!m_start)  {
00104                 m_start = m_end = node;
00105                 return;
00106             }
00107             m_end->SetNext(node);
00108             node->SetPrevious(m_end);
00109             m_end = node;
00110         }
00111 
00112         DeletedNode* GetFirst()
00113         {
00114             return m_start;
00115         }
00116 
00117     private:
00118         DeletedNode*    m_start;
00119         DeletedNode*    m_end;
00120 };
